title: 11. Anxiety in the Treatment Room: Managing Your Own Nerves for Calmer Services
description:
If you're feeling nervous in the treatment room, yes it's ironic, but it's not abnormal! In this episode we are covering lifestyle hacks fro calmer services, possible triggers for anxiety in the treatment room, and how we work around those! We would love to hear what you do to battle anxiety - leave us a comment on Instagram and let's have a chat! Let us know what you think by leaving us a review! Looking forward to your feedback! Xo, Tess + Lo 

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly  Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics Music by LiQwYd 

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
